description.en:
During the course it will be two instruments learned - bass and drums. The work will be in two groups. Student whose main instrument is bass will also learn drums full time (3EAP) and drum student will also learn bass full time3EAP)

* bass guitar's function in an ensemble
* the building of a bass guitar
* the technique of making a sound
* note placements on the fingerboard
* minor and major scales and triads
* exercises to develop technique
* the basics for creating a bass part



*  drums' function in an ensemble
*  the building and tuning of drums 
*  the technique of making a sound on drums 
*  different exercises for developing technique
* main grooves in rhythm music
description.et:
Õppeaine  raames õpitakse kahte instrumenti(bass ja trummid).Töö toimub kahes rühmas. Üliõpilane, kelle põhipilliks on bass, õpib trummi täies mahus(3EAP) ja trummieriala üliõpilane õpib bassi täies mahus(3EAP)
* basskitarri funktsioon ansamblis
* basskitarri ehitus
* helitekitamise võtted*
* nootide asetus sõrmlaual
* mazoor-ja minoorheliredelid ja kolmkõlad
* harjutused tehnika arendamiseks
* bassipartii kujundamise alused

* trummide funktsioon ansamblis
* trummide ehitus ja häälestus
* trummide helitekitamise võtted
* erinevad harjutused tehnika arendamiseks
* tehnilised harjutused
* rütmimuusika enimlevinud rütmid

objectives.en: Acquiring basic playing technique on drums and bass.
objectives.et: Elementaarsete mänguvõtete omandamine trummil ja basskitarril.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the course is able to:
*  knows the basics of playing technique
*  is able to play basic scales and triads
*  is able to create a simple bass part
*plays a simple song (blues, bossa nova etc) with a trio
learning_outcomes.et: * mängib trio koosseisus mõne lihtsa pala(blueAs, bossa nova jm)

learning_outcomes.en: *  is able to tune the drums
*  is able to play the main grooves
*  is able to create different exercises for developing playing technique

independent_work.et: Vastavalt õppejõu poolt antud ülesannetele instrumendi harjutamine
